title: Perfluoro-1-butanesulfonic acid etching strategy for dendrite suppression in aqueous zinc metal batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19090-19095
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03632H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wanhao Chen, Changhao Zhu, Xinnan Xu, Xuejun Liu
Perfluoro-1-butanesulfonic acid (PFBS) was used to etch on the surface of a zinc anode to introduce a 3D C4F9O3S–Zn interface layer with unique fluorine groups (Zn@PFBS) to inhibit the formation of dendrites.
